channel.title: Slate's Stranger Than Fiction
channel.description: Law professor and author Tim Wu talks to leading science fiction writers about whether we're already living in the future.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Law professor and author Tim Wu talks to leading science fiction writers about whether we're already living in the future.
channel.itunes:author: Slate
channel.itunes:summary: Law professor and author Tim Wu talks to leading science fiction writers about whether we're already living in the future.
channel.content:encoded: Law professor and author Tim Wu talks to leading science fiction writers about whether we're already living in the future.

item.title: Stranger Than Fiction: Robert Sawyer
item.description: Tim Wu talks with Robert Sawyer, a science fiction writer who is the author of The Terminal Experiment and The Neanderthal Parallax. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
item.itunes:author: Slate
item.itunes:subtitle: Tim Wu talks with Robert Sawyer, a science fiction writer who is the author of The Terminal Experiment and The Neanderthal Parallax. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
item.itunes:summary: Tim Wu talks with Robert Sawyer, a science fiction writer who is the author of The Terminal Experiment and The Neanderthal Parallax. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
item.content:encoded: Tim Wu talks with Robert Sawyer, a science fiction writer who is the author of The Terminal Experiment and The Neanderthal Parallax. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.

item.title: Stranger Than Fiction: Cory Doctorow
item.description: Tim Wu talks with Cory Doctorow, a science fiction writer and copyright activist who is the author of such books as Little Brother and Homeland. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
item.itunes:author: Slate
item.itunes:subtitle: Tim Wu talks with Cory Doctorow, a science fiction writer and copyright activist who is the author of such books as Little Brother and Homeland. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.

item.content:encoded: Tim Wu talks with Cory Doctorow, a science fiction writer and copyright activist who is the author of such books as Little Brother and Homeland. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.

item.title: Stranger Than Fiction: Neal Stephenson
item.description: Tim Wu talks with Neal Stephenson, a science fiction writer and author of such books as Anathem and Snow Crash. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
item.itunes:author: Slate
item.itunes:subtitle: Tim Wu talks with Neal Stephenson, a science fiction writer and author of such books as Anathem and Snow Crash. Stranger Than Fiction is a co-production of Slate and the New America Foundation.
